prompt: <description>3D Model of a Rectangular Prism with a Single Hole through its Center Part 1: Base Rectangular Prism Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The front face is angled at 45 degrees. Start by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] * Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0068] For the sketch, create a rectangle on the XY plane with the following dimensions: * Face 1: + Loop 1: - Line 1: [0.0, 0.0] to [0.75, 0.0] - Line 2: [0.75, 0.0] to [0.75, 0.5455] - Line 3: [0.75, 0.5455] to [0.0, 0.5455] - Line 4: [0.0, 0.5455] to [0.0, 0.0] Extrude the rectangle by a distance of 0.0068 in the positive Z direction. Part 2: Cutout for Hole Create a simple, flat, rectangular shape with a pointed corner. This part will be used to cut a hole through the base rectangular prism. Start by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] * Translation Vector: [0.096, 0.2719, 0.0068] For the sketch, create a square on the XY plane with the following dimensions: * Face 1: + Loop 1: - Line 1: [0.017, 0.0] to [0.5625, 0.0] - Line 2: [0.5625, 0.0] to [0.5625, 0.0341] - Line 3: [0.5625, 0.0341] to [0.017, 0.0341] - Arc 1: Radius 0.017, angled at [0.017, 0.0341] to [0.017, 0.0] Extrude the square by a distance of 0.0852 in the negative Z direction. Part 3: Top Tapered Prism Create a 3D model of a rectangular prism with a slightly tapered top and bottom. Start by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] * Translation Vector: [0.3449, 0.2481, 0.0068] For the sketch, create two squares on the XY plane and the YZ plane with the following dimensions: * Face 1 (XY plane): + Loop 1: - Line 1: [0.0, 0.0] to [0.0818, 0.0] - Line 2: [0.0818, 0.0] to [0.0818, 0.017] - Line 3: [0.0818, 0.017] to [0.0, 0.017] - Line 4: [0.0, 0.017] to [0.0, 0.0] * Face 2 (YZ plane): + Loop 1: - Line 1: [0.0, 0.0648] to [0.0818, 0.0648] - Line 2: [0.0818, 0.0648] to [0.0818, 0.0818] - Line 3: [0.0818, 0.0818] to [0.0, 0.0818] - Line 4: [0.0, 0.0818] to [0.0, 0.0648] Extrude both squares by a distance of 0.2045 in the positive Z direction. Part 4: Hole's Tapered Cylindrical Surface Create a cylindrical</description>
